channel.title: Hybrid PvP Death PK
channel.description: In Hybrid PvP, [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487174.msg3570477.html]this one[/url], when you die in the wilderness, by NPC, or anything else, you do not lose your items. If anyone knows where exactly the piece of code is that does this is, please help me out. Thanks!

item.title: Hybrid PvP Death PK
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

In Hybrid PvP, this one, when you die in the wilderness, by NPC, or anything else, you do not lose your items. If anyone knows where exactly the piece of code is that does this is, please help me out.
Thanks!
